comments.content:
We seem to be having a Lydian/ [Lisbon](http://web.archive.org/web/20091201203558/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atlisbon/) revival. This is the second post in less than a day for this font.

- Mike Yanega
It certainly is, I’ve seen it being used in lots of work from Sweden, Netherlands, Spain etc...

Considering it was designed 70 years ago by Warren Chappell, it shows how “everything old is new again” continues to be true.

- Mike Yanega
